name: Gang Of Beast: Gang Monsters
description:
Punch, Kick & Throw them out!

Grab your favorite mini ragdoll in this physics based gang fighting game. And prepare yourself to be a part of the best fighter.

Just stay in the ring till the end. Punch the other ragdoll, hit them or throw them outside the ring, and you are the hero of the stick fight. This is the time to show your skills. Pull up your sleeves, polish your skills, upgrade your powers and join the tournament of super mini ragdoll wrestlers.

This ragdoll fight is unique & different and specially designed for the lovers of ragdoll games. Your ragdoll is now in a superhero style which definitely drives you crazy and makes your joy double. This punching game will make you feel like real wrestling but in the style of a stickman fight.

FEATURES:
-Be a super hero of the gang.
-Stick man combat
-Two touch control
-Punch ‘em, hit ‘em or throw ‘em
-Skills of Boxing games & punching games
-Multiple fighting modes
-3D animation of unique monster players of gang beast
-Smooth graphics and amazing environment
-Offline game and easy to play.
